title: The Super Slow Show
overview: Gavin Free and Daniel Gruchy launched their YouTube Original, The Super Slow Show in 2018. This show was essentially The Slow Mo Guys, featuring different stunts and experiments, shot with high-speed cameras, but on a grander scope, featuring new equipment, larger stunts, such as crashing through walls, and even special guests, including Dylan Sprouse and Mayim Bialik.
